title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry the bacon until crispy.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan together in a bowl.
Drain the pasta and mix with bacon.
Remove from heat, stir in egg mixture quickly, season with pepper, and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with spices and yogurt, then grill until golden.
Heat butter in a pan and cook tomato puree with spices.
Add grilled chicken and simmer in the sauce.
Stir in cream and cook for 5 more minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan bread.
